title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times but still receive an 'Invalid Credentials' error.

title: Payment Failed - Card Declined
description: Customer attempted to pay using Visa ending 1234 but the payment keeps failing despite having sufficient balance in their account.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: Customer cannot download their January invoice from the billing section. The download button is disabled and no file is generated.

title: App Crash on Launch
description: Customer reports that the mobile app crashes immediately upon opening on Android 13 devices. iOS app is unaffected.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Issue
description: Customer is not receiving 2FA codes on their registered phone number. They tried resending the OTP but it never arrives.

title: Incorrect Billing Address
description: Customer’s billing address shows a different city. They updated it in their profile but the old address is still displayed during checkout.

title: Refund Not Processed
description: Customer requested a refund two weeks ago but has not received the amount yet. They followed up twice with no update.

title: Unable to Update Profile Picture
description: Customer tries to upload a new profile picture but receives an 'Upload Failed' error every time, even with small file sizes.

title: Subscription Auto-Renewal Issue
description: Customer wants to enable auto-renewal for their subscription but the toggle option in settings is disabled and unclickable.

title: Missing Order Confirmation Email
description: Customer placed an order but did not receive a confirmation email. The payment succeeded but there’s no order reference in their inbox.

title: Delayed Order Delivery
description: Customer reports that their order has not been delivered even after the estimated delivery date passed by 3 days.

title: Password Reset Email Not Received
description: Customer attempted to reset their password but never received the reset email, even after multiple tries.

title: App Freezes During Checkout
description: When trying to checkout, the app freezes after selecting the payment method. Customer has to restart the app.

title: Unable to Change Email Address
description: Customer cannot update their email address in account settings. The save button remains disabled after entering new email.

title: Live Chat Support Not Loading
description: Customer tried to reach live support through the chat widget, but it keeps loading indefinitely without connecting.

title: Promo Code Not Applied
description: Customer entered a valid promo code during checkout but the discount was not applied to their order.

title: App Notification Not Working
description: Customer enabled notifications but is not receiving any alerts for order updates or promotions.

title: Shipping Address Not Saved
description: Customer added a new shipping address, but it disappears after logging out and back into the account.

title: Invoice Shows Wrong Amount
description: Customer received an invoice that lists a higher amount than what was displayed at checkout.

title: App Logout Automatically
description: Customer reports that the app logs them out automatically after a few minutes of inactivity, even when 'Remember Me' is enabled.
